select d.name as 'deptName', SUM(case s.grade_protect_level when '2' then 1 else 0 end) as 'grade2num', SUM(case s.grade_protect_level when '3' then 1 else 0 end) as 'grade3num', SUM(case s.grade_protect_level when '4' then 1 else 0 end) as 'grade4num' from sys_info as s, department as d where s.department_id = d.id group by d.name
